name: SimpleWeb
description: Simple Dashboard for a quick overview of the bot
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Very much BETA WIP stuff, you need to have the --rpc flag to use it, check out [p]routes for the available routes. Example: 127.0.0.1:6133/ 
 The port 6133 needs to be exposed if you are accessing it remotely (which usually isnt a good idea)
author: epic guy
